name: Disco Manager
summary: Purchase a suitable building and think about what direction you want to go. Should it be a village-disco, techno shed or prefer a hipper Club? ! The ultimate challenge is waiting for you, you are the new Disco Tycoon. Determine how big should be the rooms, pull manually walls high and make the interior bar, tables, dance floors, drink machines, chandeliers, laser lights, smoke machines, Lounges , and much more, making your disco hit. The ultimate challenge awaits you. Build a mega disco with various dance floors and small club facilities and become the new Disco Tycoon!
